options.label: Automatic: Result is computed by the Formula Applet
Manual: You have to specify a result

label: Expression (LATEX)
name: TEX_expression
description: Use this field only if you are familiar with LATEX

name: formulaAppletPhysics
label: Physics Mode
description:
Check if result is a physical quantity (value and unit).
Uncheck if result is a mathematical expression.

name: definitionSets
label: Conditions
description:
Definition set: List of conditions to be fulfilled if expression is checked
Example: x >= 0 & x^2 < y

name: precision
label: Precision
description: Required precision of answer, e.g. 0,5% or 0.5% or 0.005

label: Formula Applet Id
name: id
description: Id of the Formula Applet - has to be unique
